ISSUE.TITLE: `podman info` must return `netavark` and `aardvark-dns` version.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature request description Output of `podman info` must include `netavark` and `aardvark-dns` version just like `crun`. ### Suggest potential solution _No response_ ### Have you considered any alternatives? A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered. ### Additional context Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18788 from ygalblum/quadlet-pull Quadlet - add support for Pull key in .container

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add netavark and aardvark-dns to podman info Fixes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/18443 Signed-off-by: Daniel J Walsh <dwalsh@redhat.com>

libpod: Podman info output more network information podman info prints the network information about binary path, package version, program version and DNS information. Fixes: #18443 Signed-off-by: Toshiki Sonoda <sonoda.toshiki@fujitsu.com>
